column4: Can anyone help me with a keyboard setting & How to undo keyboard changes?
setxbkmap <desired keyboard layout>    is useful
any advice as to font rendering of qt3 programs under ubuntu 10.04 with gnome? I believe I need to configure subpixel smoothing without access to corresponding qt3 gui tools
So would i enter "setxbkmap downarrow" or "default"? (i've only been running Ubuntu for about 3 weeks
what do you want to do?
my time to help is unfortunately very limited
Set my Downarrow back to moving down.
the setxkbmap command is followed by two letter abreviations such as us or de or longer keyboard layout names such as dvorak
one moment
research xmodmap which allows you to change the function of keys when you know the key's identification number
i.e. man xmodmap to look up the manual page
and the other command to obtain the corresponding key identification number, I'm trying to remember or find what that is
ok, i will look it up and see what i can change. I tried setxkbmap us and it did not change it. So i'll look at that. :)
i know the keybord usb code. it is 0x70051
the Up arrow is 0x70052
ok good, there are also two digit number representations
I am unsure which you need
the command: xev
i dont know the 2 number one. but i'll look around through the manual real quick and see if that helps me.
run the command, a window appears, hover your mouse over the window, and type the arrow key
the output in the terminal will indicate information about the key or mouse events
including the corresponding numbers
ok, must go, best of luck
thank you very much for yor help
